content: this is a summary of a legal case where the details of the dispute and outcome are not provided the case was heard by the higher court in ljubljana and a judgment was made on january 15 2021 in the first instance court the plaintiffs costs for the case were 667500 eur which the defendant is responsible for covering the case involves a compensation claim and has reached the court of appeal the legal procedure was completed on january 15 2021 the final resolution of the case involves properties but specific details are not mentioned the division of ownership is determined with the plaintiff receiving 60 and the defendant receiving 40 the court of appeal has made a judgment changing the shares to 64 for one party and 36 for the other party the court decision states that the defendant made a higher contribution to the care of the children and household while the plaintiff made a slightly higher financial contribution the defendant is entitled to a greater share of the coowned property based on their specific assets contributed the applicants appeal has been granted amending the judgment of the court of first instance the defendant is ordered to pay the applicant 21725 eur for the costs of the appeal the court has made a judgment in an appeal case regarding joint property with the applicant owning 60 and the defendant owning 40 the defendant is also required to pay the applicants legal costs which amount to 395992 eur the judgment in the case was appealed by both parties but the applicants request was dismissed and the defendant was ordered to pay the costs the court found that the defendant had made contributions to the coowned property and dismissed the applicants claim the court applied the marriage and family relations act in determining the division of property the court of appeal agreed with the decision of the first instance court the court reviewed the income of both parties and found that the applicant had a higher income during certain periods the court also considered the defendants contributions to the household and children the court found that the defendant had disproportionately contributed to the care of the household and children justifying a greater share of the coowned property the court also considered the defendants special assets contribution the court awarded the applicant a larger share of the jointly owned property the courts decision on costs was reviewed and found to be correct the judgment of the court of first instance was partially modified the court of appeal upheld the judgment and ordered the applicant to pay a portion of the costs of the appeal the defendant is entitled to receive costs for the proceedings the court assessed the case and the applicant was successful in some of their claims the defendant is required to reimburse the applicant for the costs of the appeal proceedings if the defendant fails to make the payment they will be subject to default interest the defendant is also responsible for bearing the costs of the appeal proceedings
